Bibliographic References: PP, no. 380, fig. 62; PPSupp, no. 498; Schauenburg, RM 62, 1955, pis. 48, 1 and 49, 1.
Imagery Description: (a) Jason and the golden fleece, (b) Eros, woman and youth; above—busts of a woman and a youth draped in a himation. Neck: (a) young silen pursuing maenad, (b) young silen offers beadNon Sepcifiedwreath to maenad.
